content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in München.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: The reason for not reaching an agreement was that we were unable to find a mutually acceptable price. I, as the landlord, was seeking a higher price, while Haoyu Wang, as the potential tenant, was looking for a lower price due to his student status.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As Peter Schmidt, I would rate Haoyu Wang's likeability as a negotiation partner as 8. There were no personal issues, and the negotiation was conducted in a respectful and professional manner.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As there was no indication of discrimination or offense in the provided conversation, I have no reason to feel as such.
name: Peter Schmidt
